scripts.generate: npm run generate-js && npm run generate-python
scripts.generate-js: openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-axios -i src/API.yaml -o languages/javascript/src/ && cd languages/javascript && npm i && npm run build
scripts.generate-python: openapi-generator-cli generate -g python -i src/API.yaml -o languages/python/src/ && cd languages/python
